EverQuest Theme for Microsoft Plus! users
Looking for a theme for Microsoft Plus!?  One based on EverQuest?  Well look no further.  I've created one especially for you.  It's still being refined, but here's what you can use now, and what I'm using already.  Be advised that the size is roughly 2.5MB.

Don't have Microsoft Plus!?  Don't fret.  You can get a variety of similar type applications from the net.  One too is by Tucows itself.  Click here to download the Tucows Theme Editor/Installer.
AllaKhazam's Magical Realm The info on this site is just too much to mention.  One of the most complete sites, but certainly not one of the prettiest.  Yet it loads far faster, and is much more reliable, then some I've visited.
Archonon.Com A site devoted strictly to showing screen captures of various areas of EverQuest.   If you want to see just what this world looks like, the collection here should definitely help.
Crossroads of Norrath Dedicated to bringing you as much news about EverQuest as is humanly possible.
EQ-OnLine A very good information site.  Yet not always as current as you'd want.
EQ Vault This was one of the first sites (revamped, and after a name change) for EverQuest.  It has lots to see, including a ton of forums.  Of special interest is their guild and player database.
EverGuide News, Help, Forums, Guilds, Artwork, Files, Links, and more
EverQuest Express Here is a rather unique site.  A newspaper format for the game.  Lots of information, player insight, original artwork, all packed on newsprint type sheets with clickable links to the full articles.  Get your information here.
EverQuest Stomped This site is more like a big database which can show you items based on race, class to be worn or wielded.  More is available, yet it lacks info on magical properties.
MGO's EverQuest Center A site with nothing yet.  However, if you're into wanting to make guides, be it race/class or travel, then this is the place to contact people.  Your input could make you a prominent figure at this site.
Rathe Rhapsody A wonderful site, by wonderful Raene, devoted to the server she participates on, The Rathe.   You can also commission a portrait by her (check the Original Art section of this site for samples).  Fees are based on level and applicable to the Rathe server specifically.  Outside of that, if you play on the Rathe, you MUST check this site out.
The Worlds of EverQuest Yet another great site with gobs and gobs of information about EverQuest, including how to travel around and locate your corpse (isn't that what we spend our time doing a lot?).  It's soon to be located on a new server, but still one worthy of viewing.
